    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>

            <entry>aspect:eri/10009</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Zgradba računalnika</string>
            <string language="en">Computer hardware</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Computerhardware</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matériel d'ordinateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ferragem de computador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hardware di calcolatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υλικό υπολογιστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hardware</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o zgradbi računalnika v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: CPE, pomnilnik, vhodno/izhodne naprave, vmesniki, cevovod, ...</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about computer hardware, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: CPU, memory, input/output devices, interfaces, pipeline, ...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">računalnik</string>
            <string language="en">computer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">procesor</string>
            <string language="en">processor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pomnilnik</string>
            <string language="en">memory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vmesnik</string>
            <string language="en">interface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">cpe</string>
            <string language="en">cpu</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel über Computerhardware, Teil Ematerialien
für Informatik und Informatik. Kapitelinhalt: CPU, 
Speicher, Input/Output Einheiten, Schnittstellen, Rohrleitung...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapitre au sujet de matériel d'ordinateur, 
partie d'e-matériels pour l'informatique et informatique. 
Contenu de chapitre : Unité centrale de traitement, 
mémoire, dispositifs d'entrée-sortie, interfaces, canalisation...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capítulo sobre a ferragem de computador, parte 
dos e-materiais para a informática de e informatics. Índices 
do capítulo: Processador central, memória, dispositivos do 
input/output, relações, encanamento...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capitolo circa il hardware di calcolatore facente
parte i e-materiali per informatica ed informatica. Soddisfare 
di capitolo: CPU, memoria, dispositivi dell'ingreso/uscita, 
interfacce, conduttura...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαιο για το υλικό υπολογιστών, μέρος των ε-υλικών
για την πληροφορική και την πληροφορική. Περιεχόμενο 
κεφαλαίου: ΚΜΕ, μνήμη, συσκευές εισόδου/εξόδου, 
διαπροσωπείες, σωλήνωση...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capítulo sobre el hardware, parte de los 
e-materiales para la informática e informática. Contenido del 
capítulo: CPU, memoria, dispositivos de la entrada-salida, 
interfaces, tubería...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Computer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozessor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Speicher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schnittstelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">CPU</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">processeur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">computador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">processador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">CPU</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
